name: JLPT N4 Reading Quiz
instructions: Type the reading of the below word in Hiragana!

cards.question: 枝
cards.meaning: branch; bow; bough; twig; limb, counter for long, thin things (i.e. swords)

cards.question: 戸
cards.meaning: door (esp. Japanese-style), shutter; window shutter, entrance (to a home), narrows, counter for houses, households, apartments, etc.

cards.question: 下げる
cards.meaning: to hang, to lower, to move back

cards.question: 庭
cards.meaning: garden; yard; courtyard, field (of action); area

cards.question: 特急
cards.meaning: limited express train (faster than an express train)

cards.question: 座る
cards.meaning: to sit; to squat, to assume (a position), to hold steady; to hold still

cards.question: 差す
cards.meaning: to shine, to be visible, to be tinged with, to rise (of water levels); to flow in, to be felt (i.e. as an emotion); to come over one, to hold up (an umbrella, etc.)

cards.question: 吹く
cards.meaning: to blow (e.g. wind); to play a wind instrument, to emit; to spout, to whistle, to laugh; to burst into laughter, to smelt; to mint, to brag; to talk big

cards.question: 吸う
cards.meaning: to smoke; to breathe in; to inhale, to suck; to sip; to slurp, to absorb; to soak up, to kiss

cards.question: 首
cards.meaning: neck, head, dismissal; discharge; firing (from a job)

cards.question: 集まる
cards.meaning: to gather; to collect; to assemble

cards.question: 降り出す
cards.meaning: to begin to rain; to begin to snow

cards.question: 間に合う
cards.meaning: to be in time for, to serve (suit, meet) the purpose; to be good enough; to be enough

cards.question: 部長
cards.meaning: head (chief, director) of a section or department, head of a (school) club; head of a (school) team

cards.question: 遊び
cards.meaning: playing, play (margin between on and off, gap before pressing button or lever has an effect)

cards.question: 遅れる
cards.meaning: to be late; to be delayed; to fall behind schedule; to be overdue

cards.question: 進む
cards.meaning: to advance; to go forward, to precede; to go ahead (of), to make progress; to improve, to deepen; to heighten, to be fast (of a clock); to be ahead, to do of one's own free will, to grow wild

cards.question: 連絡
cards.meaning: to contact; to get in touch, contacting; getting in touch; communication; call; message, connection; coordination; junction, intercalary; intercalaris; internuncial

cards.question: 込む
cards.meaning: to be crowded; to be packed, to be complex, to go into; to put into; to remain (seated); to be plunged into (silence); to do thoroughly, to do intently, to continue in the same state

cards.question: 林
cards.meaning: woods; forest; copse; thicket, bunch; line (of something); collection

cards.question: 着る
cards.meaning: to put on from the shoulders down

cards.question: 負ける
cards.meaning: to lose; to be defeated, to succumb; to give in; to surrender; to yield, to be inferior to, to break out in a rash due to (e.g. lacquer, shaving, etc.), to reduce the price

cards.question: 裏
cards.meaning: bottom (or another side that is hidden from view); undersurface; opposite side; reverse side, rear; back; behind (the house), lining; inside, out of sight; behind the scenes

cards.question: 葉
cards.meaning: leaf, counter for leaves, pieces of paper, etc., counter for boats

cards.question: 落ちる
cards.meaning: to fall down; to drop; to fall (e.g. rain); to sink (e.g. sun or moon); to fall onto (e.g. light or one's gaze); to be used in a certain place (e.g. money), to be omitted

cards.question: 落とす
cards.meaning: to drop; to lose; to let fall; to shed (light); to cast (one's gaze); to pour in (liquid); to leave behind, to clean off (dirt, makeup, paint, etc.); to remove (e.g. stains or facial hair)

cards.question: 草
cards.meaning: grass; weed; herb; thatch, ninja, not genuine; substandard, laughter; LOL, draft; rough copy, cursive script; "grass" kanji

cards.question: 船
cards.meaning: ship; boat; watercraft; vessel; steamship, tank; tub; vat; trough, counter for boat-shaped containers (e.g. of sashimi)

cards.question: 腕
cards.meaning: arm, skill; efforts; ability, arm (esp. upper arm), counter used to measure the thickness of round objects

cards.question: 線
cards.meaning: line; stripe; stria, line (e.g. telephone line); wire, ray (e.g. X-ray); beam, line (e.g. of a railroad); track; route; lane, outline; contours; form, level, division, line (of action)

cards.question: 続ける
cards.meaning: to continue; to keep up; to keep on

cards.question: 続く
cards.meaning: to continue; to last; to go on, to continue (without a break); to be unbroken, to occur again and again, to lead to; to connect to; to adjoin, to come after; to follow

cards.question: 約束
cards.meaning: promise; agreement; arrangement; one's word; contract; pact; appointment; engagement; date, convention; rule, destiny; fate

cards.question: 簡単
cards.meaning: simple; easy; uncomplicated, brief; quick; light

cards.question: お礼
cards.meaning: thanks; gratitude, manners; etiquette, bow, reward; gift, ceremony; ritual

cards.question: お祝い
cards.meaning: congratulation; congratulations; celebration; festival; congratulatory gift

cards.question: 笑う
cards.meaning: to laugh, to smile, to sneer; to ridicule, to be dumbfounded; to be flabbergasted

cards.question: 砂
cards.meaning: sand; grit, gold dust; silver dust

cards.question: 上がる
cards.meaning: to rise; to go up; to come up; to ascend; to be raised, to enter (esp. from outdoors); to come in; to go in, to enter (a school); to advance to the next grade, to get out (of water)

cards.question: 石
cards.meaning: stone, gem; jewel, measure of volume (approx. 180.39 liters, 6.37 cub. ft.), measure of a Japanese-style boat's loading capacity (approx. 278.26 liters)

cards.question: 眠る
cards.meaning: to sleep (not necessarily lying down), to die, to lie idle (e.g. of resources); to be dormant; to be unused, to close one's eyes

cards.question: 久しぶり
cards.meaning: a long time (since the last time); it's been a while (since I last saw, mailed, etc., you)

cards.question: 乗り物
cards.meaning: vehicle; conveyance; transport, ride (playground, fair, carnival); playground facility

cards.question: 交通
cards.meaning: traffic; transportation; communication; exchange (of ideas, etc.); intercourse

cards.question: 伝える
cards.meaning: to convey; to report; to transmit; to communicate; to tell; to impart; to propagate; to teach; to bequeath

cards.question: 似る
cards.meaning: to resemble; to look like; to take after, to be similar (in status, condition, etc.); to be close; to be alike; to be like

cards.question: 片付ける
cards.meaning: to tidy up; to put in order; to straighten up; to put away, to settle (problem); to clear (dispute), to finish; to bring something to an end, to marry off (e.g. a daughter), to do away with someone

cards.question: 点
cards.meaning: dot; point; mark, gidayuu musicians (in kabuki), spot; mark, point; dot, mark (e.g. in exam); score; points, comma, aspect; matter; respect, counter for goods, items, articles of clothing, works of art, etc., dot

cards.question: 優しい
cards.meaning: tender; kind; gentle; graceful; affectionate; amiable

cards.question: 先輩
cards.meaning: senior (at work or school); superior; elder; older graduate; progenitor; old-timer

cards.question: 光
cards.meaning: light, illumination; ray; beam; gleam; glow, happiness; hope, influence; power, vision; eyesight

cards.question: 光る
cards.meaning: to shine; to glitter; to be bright

cards.question: 内
cards.meaning: inside; within, while, among; amongst; between, we (referring to one's in-group, e.g. company, etc.); our, my spouse, imperial palace grounds, emperor, I (primarily used by women and children)

cards.question: 冷たい
cards.meaning: cold (to the touch); chilly; icy; freezing, coldhearted; unfeeling

cards.question: 湯
cards.meaning: hot water, hot bath; hot spring, molten iron, soup

cards.question: 包む
cards.meaning: to wrap up; to tuck in; to pack; to do up; to cover with; to dress in, to conceal; to hide; to be engulfed in; to be enveloped by, to wrap up; to tuck in; to pack

cards.question: 十分
cards.meaning: 10 minutes, plenty; enough; sufficient; satisfactory; adequate, division into ten, perfectly; thoroughly; fully; in full

cards.question: 卒業
cards.meaning: graduation; completion (e.g. of a course), outgrowing something; moving on

cards.question: 受ける
cards.meaning: to receive; to get, to catch (e.g. a ball), to be struck by (wind, waves, sunlight, etc.), to sustain (damage); to incur (a loss); to suffer (an injury); to feel (influence), to undergo (e.g. surgery)

cards.question: 合う
cards.meaning: to come together; to merge; to unite; to meet, to fit; to match; to suit; to agree with; to be correct, to be profitable; to be equitable, to do ... to each other

cards.question: 向かう
cards.meaning: to face, to go towards; to head towards

cards.question: 君
cards.meaning: you; buddy; pal, monarch; ruler; sovereign; (one's) master, Mr (junior); master; boy, suffix appended to somebody else's family members, you

cards.question: 周り
cards.meaning: circumference; girth, surroundings; neighbourhood; neighborhood; vicinity

cards.question: 困る
cards.meaning: to be troubled; to be worried; to be bothered; to be embarrassed; to be stumped

cards.question: 固い
cards.meaning: hard; solid; tough, stiff; tight; wooden; unpolished (e.g. writing), strong; firm (not viscous or easily moved), safe; steady; honest; steadfast, obstinate; stubborn, bookish

cards.question: 深い
cards.meaning: deep, profound, dense; thick, close (relationship), intense; strong, late

cards.question: 場所
cards.meaning: place; location; spot; position, room; space, basho; wrestling tournament

cards.question: 変
cards.meaning: strange; odd; peculiar; weird; curious; queer; eccentric; funny; suspicious; fishy, unexpected, change, incident; disturbance; disaster; accident, flat

cards.question: 変える
cards.meaning: to change; to alter; to transform; to convert; to turn; to vary, to reform; to revise; to amend

cards.question: 変わる
cards.meaning: to change; to be transformed; to be altered; to vary, to move to, to be different; to be uncommon; to be unusual

cards.question: 太る
cards.meaning: to grow fat (stout, plump); to become fat; to gain weight

cards.question: 泣く
cards.meaning: to cry; to weep; to sob; to howl

cards.question: 娘
cards.meaning: (my) daughter, girl (i.e. a young, unmarried woman)

cards.question: 客
cards.meaning: guest; visitor, customer; client; shopper; spectator; audience; tourist; sightseer; passenger, visitor from afar; guest, visitor from afar, joy-bringing spirit from the divine realms

cards.question: 届ける
cards.meaning: to deliver; to forward; to send, to report; to notify; to file notice (to the authorities); to give notice; to register

cards.question: 島
cards.meaning: island, territory (of a prostitute, organized crime gang, etc.); turf, Island, insula; island; islet

cards.question: 泊まる
cards.meaning: to stay at (e.g. hotel), to be docked; to be berthed; to be moored

cards.question: 決める
cards.meaning: to decide; to choose; to determine; to make up one's mind; to resolve; to set one's heart on; to settle; to arrange; to set; to appoint; to fix, to clinch (a victory)

cards.question: 布団
cards.meaning: futon (quilted Japanese-style mattress laid out on the floor), round cushion used for Zen meditation (traditionally made of woven bulrush leaves)

cards.question: 席
cards.meaning: seat, location (of a gathering, etc.); place, position; post, woven mat (esp. one made of straw), seat

cards.question: 引き出し
cards.meaning: drawer, withdrawal; drawing out, variety of knowledge and experience useful for handling things impromptu

cards.question: 決まる
cards.meaning: to be decided; to be settled, to look good in (clothes)

cards.question: 役に立つ
cards.meaning: to be helpful; to be useful

cards.question: 彼
cards.meaning: that (indicating something distant from both speaker and listener (in space, time or psychologically), or something understood without naming it directly), that person (used to refer to one's equals or inferiors), over there, down there (i.e. one's genitals), period

cards.question: 怒る
cards.meaning: to get angry; to get mad, to tell someone off; to scold, to be angular; to be square

cards.question: 毛
cards.meaning: hair, fur; wool, down; plumage; feathers, one-thousandth; 0.03 mm (one-thousandth of a sun); 0.01 percent (one-thousandth of a wari); 3.75 milligrams (one-thousandth of a monme), old monetary unit (0.0001 yen)

cards.question: 戻る
cards.meaning: to turn back (e.g. half-way), to return; to go back, to recover (e.g. something lost); to be returned, to rebound; to spring back, to go against; to act contrary to

cards.question: 手伝う
cards.meaning: to help; to assist; to aid, to contribute to; to be a factor in

cards.question: 打つ
cards.meaning: to hit; to strike; to knock; to beat; to punch; to slap; to tap; to bang; to clap; to pound, to strike (noon, etc.); to sound (cymbals, etc.); to beat (a drum, etc.), to beat (rhythmically, e.g. pulse, waves, etc.), to move

cards.question: 払う
cards.meaning: to pay (e.g. money, bill), to brush off; to wipe away; to clear away; to dust off; to cut off (e.g. branches), to drive away (e.g. one's competitors), to sell off (something unneeded)

cards.question: 拾う
cards.meaning: to pick up; to find; to gather

cards.question: 指
cards.meaning: finger; toe; digit, between (e.g. two people); face to face, hindrance; impediment, arrhythmic section of recitative in noh music, prefix used for stress or emphasis, counter for traditional dance songs

cards.question: 探す
cards.meaning: to search (for something desired, needed); to look for, to search (for something lost); to seek (a suspect in a crime)

cards.question: 故障
cards.meaning: breakdown; failure; fault; accident; out of order, damage; hurt, objection; protest

cards.question: 星
cards.meaning: star; any light-emitting (or reflecting) heavenly body (except for the sun and the moon), offender; perpetrator, star point (in go); hoshi; intersection marked with a dot, circular symbol (said to be shaped like a shining star), bullseye, one's star (out of the nine stars)

cards.question: 普通
cards.meaning: general; ordinary; usual, normally; generally; usually, local train; train that stops at every station
